TextBlock.Text: MAKALU: That's the first node done, and it's quite impressive if I say so myself!
SAMATU: Good work crew, lets see if we can keep up this pace for the next one!
SILANA: I'm quite proud of this, I must say this is the largest project I've ever contributed too! The specifications were challenging, this node draws in a HUGE amount of energy!
MAKALU: Having the energy collector be dish-shaped was an excellent idea Silana, it's amazing what we can get done with such a well-balanced team! (And an unlimited budget...)
